overview: Guitarist Bob Brozman, known for his popular guitar instruction materials, showcases his unique blend of jazz, blues, and musical influences from Hawaii and the Caribbean in this live concert program. A master of slide guitar, Brozman eloquently mixes traditional American and world music to create his humorous and technically accomplished works. This program, recorded at the Freight & Salvage in Berkeley, California, features songs such as "Zonky."
title: Bob Brozman: In Concert
